name: English
catchSuccess2: They have been added to your {command_collection}.
catchFailure: Oh no! {custom_name} has broken free from the {custom_ball}!
catchFailure2: Buy another chance and try again!
catchEscape: Oh no! The wild Animon has escaped!
buySuccess2: The item(s) have been added to your {command_inventory}.

stats.defDesc: Reduces the physical damage you take.
stats.powDesc: Increases the physical damage you deal.
stats.agiDesc: Defines your speed and dodge chance.
stats.spiDesc: Increases the magical damage you deal.
stats.resDesc: Reduces the magical damage you take.

tradeCreatorDescription+offered: In this section, you can add or remove the goods you wish to **offer**.
tradeCreatorDescription+requested: In this section, you can add or remove the goods you wish to **receive**.
tradeCancel: You have successfully cancelled sending this trade offer!
tradeSent: You have successfully sent this trade offer!
tradeAccept: You have successfully accepted this trade offer!
tradeReject: You have successfully rejected this trade offer!

locale.name: Language
locale.description: Change the language of the bot.

isMobile.name: Mobile Version
isMobile.description: Enable or disable the mobile version of the bot.

profile.name: Public Profile
profile.description: Select if you want your profile to be public or private.

trades.name: Allow Trades
trades.description: Select if you want to allow trades with other users.

encounters.name: Encounters Notifications
encounters.description: Select if you want to receive notifications when your encounters recharge.

votes.name: Vote Notifications
votes.description: Select if you want to receive notifications when you are able to vote.

youVotedTimes: You have voted **{custom_count} times** in a row! Keep it up! ðŸ”¥
voteThanks: Thank you for voting! **It really means a lot!**
voteAgain: Vote again before **{custom_date}** to keep your streak going and get better rewards! Turn on the **vote notifications** to never lose your streak! Check {command_settings}!
streakResetTitle: Your vote streak has been reset!
streakReset: **Oops!** You missed a day and your daily vote streak has been reset! ðŸ˜¢
voteFirst: You have voted for the first time!
voteFirstText: That's your first vote! Keep it up!
voteNotificationText:
You can now vote for **{custom_name}** on **{custom_site}**!
To vote, prease the first button below.
voteNotificationsOff: Turn off these notifications in your {command_settings}.
hopeYouEnjoy: We hope you enjoy your new goodies!
purchaseHelp: If you haven't received your goods, hop into our [support server]({config_urls_support})!
warningInBattle:
{custom_user}, you are already in a battle!
Proceeding with the current battle...
battleInProgress: Battle between {custom_user1} and {custom_user2} is in progress...
joinTheBattle: Join the battle with {command_battle resume} or with the button below.
allocateSuccess: You have successfully allocated {custom_points} points to {custom_stat}.
removedMove: You have successfully removed {custom_move} from slot {custom_slot}.
taughtMove: You have successfully taught {custom_move} to your Animon.
voteText:
By voting for {config_bot_name} on the websites listed below, you can earn **free extra encounters** and receive **many amazing rewards**.
This process is entirely free and aids in expanding bot's outreach to a wider audience!

Vote consistently to maintain your **vote streak** and receive **better rewards**!
inviteBotText:
Invite {config_bot_name} to your server and start your adventure today!
Just [click here]({config_urls_invite}) or use the button below!
joinServerText:
Join our community server to stay updated with the latest news, events, and giveaways!
Just [click here]({config_urls_support}) or use the button below!
subscriptionNew:
You have successfully subscribed to the **{custom_name}** subscription!
Your benefits will be applied immediately.
expShare: {custom_value} of EXP shared with other Animons in your team
subscriptionChangeText:
You have successfully changed your subscription to **{custom_name}**.
Your benefits have been updated.
subscriptionEndText:
Your subscription has ended.
Your benefits have been removed.

If you wish to renew your subscription, you can do so at any time - just use the {command_premium} command!
Thanks for your support!
premiumText:
**Unlock the full potential of {config_bot_name} with Premium!**
With Premium, you can enjoy many cool perks, such as extra encounters, lower recharge times, exp share, and much more!

Getting Premium helps support the development of the bot and allows us to continue improving it for you!

Check out the available subscriptions below and choose the one that suits you best!
newTradeOffer: You have received a new trade offer!
tradeAccepted: Your trade offer {custom_id} has been accepted!
tradeRejected: Your trade offer {custom_id} has been rejected!
redeemSuccess: You have successfully redeemed your items!
battleChallengeText:
{custom_player} has been challanged to a battle by {custom_player}!
The challenged user can accept the challenge with the button below.
dailyText: **Woohoo!** You have received your daily rewards!
encountersRechargedText: Return to {config_bot_name} and collect your favorite anime characters!
disableNotifications: You can disable these notifications in your {command_settings}.
intro1:
**Welcome to {config_bot_name}**! ðŸŽ‰

We're excited to have you join the adventure! Before you begin, please take a moment to review and agree to our **Terms of Service** and **Community Guidelines**.

By continuing, you confirm that you have read and accepted these terms. This helps ensure a fair and enjoyable experience for everyone.

**[{emoji_tos} Terms of Service]({config_urls_tos})**
**[{emoji_privacy} Community Guidelines]({config_urls_guidelines})**

Once you're ready, press the button below to start your journey!
intro1Btn: I have read and accepted these terms
intro2:
**Thank you for accepting the terms!** ðŸŽ‰

You're almost ready to start your journey!
Some of the bot's functions might appear unreadable on mobile devices, so we've added a mobile version.
Please let us know if you'll be using the bot on mobile or PC.

You can always toggle the mobile version in **{command_settings}**.
intro3:
You're all set to start your adventure! ðŸš€

If you're new to the bot, you can read the {command_guide}. If you already know the basics, you can start playing right away!

Have any questions? Feel free to ask in the [support server]({config_urls_support})!

statusInfo.DEAD:
-# This Animon is unconscious.
-# Revive it using items from {command_store} or the {command_heal} command.
statusInfo.TRADE:
-# This Animon is present in active trade offer.
-# To manage it, first reject the offer with {command_trade list}.
statusInfo.FIGHT:
-# This Animon is currently in a fight.
-# You can't manage it until the fight is over.

emptyMoveText: Teach your Animon a move to fill this slot.
manageMoves:
Manage your Animon's moves using the menu below.
-# Moves are used during battles to deal damage or apply effects.
pointsText:
You have **{custom_points} Attribute Points** to allocate.
-# You gain **{custom_count} points** each time your Animon levels up.
-# Attributes enhance the effectiveness of specific moves during battle.
selectAnimon: Select an Animon to view its details!
collectionTip: View details of an Animon by using the {command_animon} command or the select menu below.
gemStoreText:
Buy **{emoji_smallGem} Gems** and level up your experience!
With gems, you can grab exclusive items in the {command_store}, unlock a second catch chance, and more!

To purchase **{emoji_smallGem} Gems**, head over to our [Discord Store]({config_urls_store}).
By making a purchase, you agree to our [Terms of Service]({config_urls_tos}).

After buying gems, they will be automatically added to your account! If they don't show up, use the {command_redeem} command to redeem them.
helpText: Looking for a guide how to start using the bot? Use {command_guide}!
selectCategoryText: Select a category of the items you would like to view.
NAME: NAME
storeText: Select a category of the items you would like to buy.
youDontHaveMoves: You don't have any moves to teach!
teamText:
Edit your team by using the menu below.
-# The order of your slots determines which Animon will enter battle first.
alreadyCreatingTrade: You are already in process of creating a trade offer. Redirecting to that offer instead.
chooseItemToAdd: Choose an item you wish to add...
chooseItemToRemove: Choose an item you wish to remove...
selectTradeOffer: Select a trade offer to view its details...
tradeListText:
Use the buttons below to navigate the list of active and past trade offers.
To create a new trade offer, use the command {command_trade new}.
maxLevelTip: The maximum level for this rarity is **{custom_maxLevel}**.
evolveTip: Evolve your Animon to increase its level cap.
successRewards:
You have successfully received your rewards!
Check your DMs!
toCapture:
To receive your rewards, you need to capture {custom_toCapture} more Animons!
Use the command {command_catch} to catch them!
disclaimer: Images of characters used in this bot are not owned by us. They are the property of their respective owners. We do not claim ownership of any of these images. If you are the owner of any of these images and want them removed, please contact us.
movesObtained: The following moves have been added to your {command_inventory}
suspendedNote: Your account has been suspended due to violating our **[Terms of Service]({config_urls_tos})** or **[Community Guidelines]({config_urls_guidelines})**. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact us in our [support server]({config_urls_support}).
welcomeText:
Hey there! I'm **{config_bot_name}**! ðŸŽ‰

{emoji_aniball} **Ready to start catching awesome anime characters?**
Just type {command_catch} and dive in!
{emoji_privacy} **Need a hand getting started?**
Check out {command_guide} for all the tips and tricks!
{emoji_cmds} **Wanna see all the cool stuff I can do?**
Hit up {command_help} for the full list of commands!

Let's catch 'em all and have a blast together! {emoji_favorite2}
noCards: You have no Animons to heal!
searchResults: We found {custom_count} results for your search:
noResults: No results found for your search.
noResultsText: Try searching for a different name.
healCost: You need to pay {emoji_smallCoin} {custom_cost} to fully heal {custom_count} of your Animons.
useItemsAbove: Use one of the items above to catch this Animon!
pointsToSpendText: Select the number of points you want to allocate.
howToGetMoves: To get new moves, visit the {command_store} and buy some **Spellbooks**!
selectAMoveType: Select a move type with the menu above first.
filterMoveTypes: Filter your available moves by type.
